body:
**For claims under £10,000**

To get an update on your claim or progress it, [sign in to the 'Money claims' service](https://www.moneyclaims.service.gov.uk) using your email address and the password you created when you created your account.

You can [request a new password](https://hmcts-access.service.gov.uk/reset/forgotpassword) if you need to.

**For claims between £10,000 and £100,000**

Telephone 0300 123 1057, Monday to Friday, 8:30am to 5pm

**For claims over £100,000**

Telephone 0300 123 1372, Monday to Friday, 8:30am to 5pm
heading: Get an update on progress for a money claim
